p: Table 1 shows that the lattice constant falls as the atomic percentage of Ni increases in all PdNi/C ratios, demonstrating the creation of an alloy between Pd and Ni [ 16]. Furthermore, when comparing PdNi/C alloys to reference Pd/C, the reduction in lattice parameter revealed a lattice contraction due to the partial replacement of Pd sites in PdNi/C alloys by smaller Ni atoms. A similar finding has already been reported in the literature [ 17]. The decrease in Pd-Pd distance for all of the prepared PdNi/C catalysts is explained by changes in the lattice parameter.
